Articles.Content:
If your like me and you played KSP for a while you will remember older mods. The mods i remember most are the N-1 by bobcat and OLDD cant tell ya why but i just do. But to my sadness;.; none of the replica n-1s have been updated for the new ksp. I am asking for an new or an updated n-1 because why no have a massive Russian rocket and your dispose:cool:.

Thanks
My team (currently working on the SSP) might be able to work on the N-1. Might have to discuss the possibility of taking over the project from denny, though...
I know they don't look that well but NovaPunch has N1 parts and also Tantares.
Lack's SXT pack has the first three stages... They're not totally accurate, but they work great and are the cornerstone of my heavy lift capacity.
You could use Procedural Parts and Soviet Engines to do it.

Thank you all for the input and suggestions it is greatly appreciated. Sampa i have your teams shuttle installed and it looking great works like a charm as I love historical recreations it is right up my ally.

Thanks for the kind words! I am currently talking to Denny about the possibility of letting my team work on some unofficial updates to his N-1 and Proton rockets.

- - - Updated - - -

also spoke with raidernick about some other stuff that may have to do with the N-1...
Cool good to hear that the N-1 may live again!

Maybe ... Just build one yourself?

Here's a first stage I built a month ago. And yes, it flies.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Maybe ... Just build one yourself?

Here's a first stage I built a month ago. And yes, it flies.

http://imgur.com/a/2Kyqs

That is by far one of the most complex looking things I've seen in KSP yet.

That is by far one of the most complex looking things I've seen in KSP yet.

It's simpler than it looks. He just had to add lines to all the small tanks below from the two larger ones above.

I have an early N1 with Gantry in Blender since 3 years. Actually, I wanted to covert her for KSP (she was made for an animation project and still uses procedural textures here and there, also some measurements are slightly off by some centimeters etc) but then switched to the Proton instead, because some detail areas of the N1 are still not well documented and many websites show them incorrectly. If there is the time (wanted to do a high quality TKS/VA first).. maybe?

Maybe ... Just build one yourself?

Here's a first stage I built a month ago. And yes, it flies.

http://imgur.com/a/2Kyqs

What... how... never mind.

Actually, I wanted to covert her for KSP (she was made for an animation project and still uses procedural textures here and there, also some measurements are slightly off by some centimeters etc) but then switched to the Proton instead, because some detail areas of the N1 are still not well documented and many websites show them incorrectly. If there is the time (wanted to do a high quality TKS/VA first).. maybe?

http://i.imgur.com/vjdZAPM.jpg

Make that gantry a Kerbal Konstructs launch site. We will love you.

Wow! That gantry looks amazing! Is there any chance you have an Energia (or Energia gantry) model lying around anywhere? Also, would it compatible with these USSR payloads/rockets? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations

That would be a SLAM DUNK!
About the old mods thing, I remember the escape pod mod. That thing was cool!
Well, I worked on the N-1 and flies pretty good, but I prefer to work on other projects.\
Hey decq, i'm not making any headway with denny, if you want, if i can convince my team, want us and raidernick to finish your model?

I have an early N1 with Gantry in Blender since 3 years.
